channel.title: 317 Delta, quests problem
channel.description: When my players log in their quests are already done. I've looked through the client.java and I'm unsure on what needs to be changed, some help please?

item.title: 317 Delta, quests problem
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

Ah, thank you so much.

Request close; solved.

item.title: 317 Delta, quests problem
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:


Your players are creating are accounts and the default settings for the char files are in player.java, you need to change that look for q1 or sumthing in there.

Your players are creating are accounts and the default settings for the char files are in player.java, you need to change that look for q1 or sumthing in there.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta, quests problem
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

I’ve tried the q1 == 15 but they are already set to q1 == 0 but the quests are still done?
Also the texthandler was already normal too.
Even when I click on the quests IG they says “you have completed questexample”

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta, quests problem
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

the quests are just showing up in green text just go to texthandler.java and look for one of tehm it should say something like this “@gre@Monkey quest” change it to “@red@Monkey quest”

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Delta, quests problem
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Search q1 == 15 and q2 == 15 and so on… q3… q4… and so on… in Client.java in Server Files. Change all them to q1 == 0 and so on… So when they log in the quests will be set back to 0 and not be started… Yw.

Read full topic
